search_results.title: James Kimmel, Jr. | Revenge and Forgiveness Expert
search_results.snippet: James Kimmel, Jr. is a Yale revenge and forgiveness expert and author of "The Science of Revenge: Understanding the World's Deadliest Addiction."

search_results.title: James P. Kimmel Jr. - Biography
search_results.snippet: James Kimmel, Jr. is a novelist, lawyer, scholar and advocate who focuses on the intersections of law and spirituality and law and psychology.
